A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney & producers pat yourself on the back!!!  Great job you just made a bad Star Wars movie.  Kudos on a great combination long and boring.  It does have some cool visual\, and a few clever-sounding lines\, but that is about it.\n\nTried to watch a second time\, just stopped after just a short time.   Just a really bad movie\, with a bad story.
